protein.specific_function: Plays an essential role in the survival of diffuse-type gastric cancer cells. May be involved in regulation of gene expression at the post-transcriptional level or in ribosome biogenesis in cancer cells

reference.reference_text: Jinawath N, Furukawa Y, Nakamura Y: Identification of NOL8, a nucleolar protein containing an RNA recognition motif (RRM), which was overexpressed in diffuse-type gastric cancer. Cancer Sci. 2004 May;95(5):430-5.
